org.hamcrest
Interface SelfDescribing

All Known Subinterfaces:
Action, Expectation, Matcher<T>, States
All Known Implementing Classes:
ActionSequence, AllOf, AnyOf, BaseMatcher, CustomAction, DescribedAs, DoAllAction, ExpectationError, HasProperty, HasPropertyWithValue, HasToString, HasXPath, Invocation, Is, IsAnything, IsArray, IsArrayContaining, IsCloseTo, IsCollectionContaining, IsCompatibleType, IsEqual, IsEqualIgnoringCase, IsEqualIgnoringWhiteSpace, IsEventFrom, IsGreaterThan, IsIn, IsInstanceOf, IsMapContaining, IsNot, IsNull, IsSame, JUnit3Mockery, JUnit4Mockery, Mockery, ReturnEnumerationAction, ReturnIteratorAction, ReturnValueAction, ScriptedAction, StringContains, StringEndsWith, StringStartsWith, SubstringMatcher, ThrowAction, TypeSafeMatcher, VoidAction
public interface SelfDescribing

The ability of an object to describe itself.

Method Summary
 void describeTo(Description description)
          Generates a description of the object.
 

Method Detail

describeTo

void describeTo(Description description)
Generates a description of the object. The description may be part of a a description of a larger object of which this is just a component, so it should be worded appropriately.

Parameters:
description - The description to be built or appended to.
